the_Manor

Class Ally

  • java.lang.Object
    • the_Manor.Character
      • the_Manor.Ally

  • public class Ally
extends Character

    This class represents all characters who are allies for the main character.

    An ally is only present in one room and there is only one ally per room.

    An ally can give objects and clues to the player.

    Version:
    2016-05-12
    Author:
    Group 6

    • Method Detail

      • getItem

        public Item getItem()
        This method allows to know the item given by the ally to the player.
        Returns:
        The item held by the ally.

      • addItem

        public void addItem(Item item)
        Allows to add an item to an ally. If an ally already possesses an item, an another item cannot be added.
        Parameters:
        item - The item to give to the ally.

      • giveItem

        public void giveItem(Player player)
        Allows the ally to give an item to the player if the ally possesses an item.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to give the item.

      • haveItem

        public boolean haveItem()
        Allows to see if an ally owns an item.
        Returns:
        Boolean True if the ally owns an item, false if he does not.

      • getMessage

        public java.lang.String getMessage()
        Allows to get the message told by the ally to the player.
        Returns:
        The message told.

      • setMessage

        public void setMessage(java.lang.String newMessage)
        Allows to set the message told by the ally to the player.
        Parameters:
        newMessage - The message to be tell.
